citethispage-desc: Lägger till en specialsida för [[Special:CiteThisPage|källhänvisning]] och en länk i verktygslådan

__NOTOC__
== Bibliografische Angaben für {{FULLPAGENAME}} == * Seitentitel: {{FULLPAGENAME}} * Autor(en): {{SITENAME}}-Bearbeiter * Herausgeber: ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. * Zeitpunkt der letzten Bearbeitung: {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * Datum des Abrufs: {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * Permanente URL: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} * Versionskennung: {{REVISIONID}}
== Zitatstile für {{FULLPAGENAME}} == === [[APA style|APA-Stil]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}. ({{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}). ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. Abgerufen am {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} von {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[The MLA style manual|MLA-Stil]] === "{{FULLPAGENAME}}." ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC. {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}>. === [[MHRA Style Guide|MHRA-Stil]] === {{SITENAME}}-Bearbeiter, '{{FULLPAGENAME}}', ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC, <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}> [abgerufen am {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}] === [[The Chicago Manual of Style|Chicago-Stil]] === {{SITENAME}}-Bearbeiter, "{{FULLPAGENAME}}," ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (abgerufen am {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === [[Council of Science Editors|CBE/CSE-Stil]] === {{SITENAME}}-Bearbeiter. {{FULLPAGENAME}} [Internet]. {{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}; {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC [zitiert am {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}]. Verfügbar unter: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[Bluebook|Bluebook-Stil]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}, {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (abgerufen am {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === [[BibTeX]]-Eintrag === @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}", note = "[Online; abgerufen am {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}]" } När [[LaTeX]]-modulen "url" används (\usepackage{url} någonstans i ingressen), vilken brukar ge mycket bättre formaterade webbadresser, kan följande vara att föredra: @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "'''\url{'''{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}'''}'''", note = "[Online; besökt {{CURRENTDAY}}. {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}]" }
